channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Academic People List -- WP Academic People List
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Academic People List -- WP Academic People List

item.title: CVE-2021-38316|2024-09-17T00:16:14.481Z -- wp%20academic%20people%20list -- wp%20academic%20people%20list
item.description: The WP Academic People List WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the category_name parameter in the ~/admin-panel.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 0.4.1.
